name: City Car Parking Games
description:
City Car Parking Games

Hello Friends,City Car parking is a realistic simulator game. Park The Car With a this Game. 

Improve your ability to park backwards! car Parking Games that require high precision is an amazing automoblie simulator game!
This game is the most beautiful and most interesting game where you have to city car parking. You get in the car, and to go to the destination. You put it perfectly into the parking lot, to validate and move to the next level.

To complete levels, you must pass all the checkpoints and stop into the parking spot. In some levels there are reverse parking spots.
This game includes action-packed ride, great graphics and challenging game that was created for those who love, are incredibly well designed game.

Key features:

=> Realistic Sounds
=> Best Real Crashes
=> Lots of Challenges to Complete
=> Addictive game play
=> Tap on right to take your shift reverse gear
